dashboard.welcomeSub: Start a service, finish your checklist, and track submissions in one place.
dashboard.nationalIdBanner: Secure your digital identity with the new National ID
dashboard.supportSub: Our support team is available 24/7 to help you navigate through government services.

tradeLicense.title: Trade License Renewal
tradeLicense.description: Annual renewal of business operation permits for commercial entities. This process synchronizes your data with the National Trade Registry.

tinRegistration.title: TIN Registration
tinRegistration.description: Get your Tax Identification Number instantly for new businesses.

passport.title: Passport Services
passport.description: New issuance and renewal of Ethiopian passports.

vitalEvents.title: Vital Events
vitalEvents.description: Register births, marriages, and other vital life events.

catalog.title: Find Government Services
catalog.subtitle: Transparent, efficient, and digital-first public services.

details.wizardDescription: Our automated agents will assist you in mapping your documents to compliance standards.
details.dataPrivacySub: This process uses end-to-end HSM encryption. Your documents are never stored in unmasked cleartext on cloud servers.
